entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
